extensionName.message: TST Open Bookmarks as Partial Tree

extensionDescription.message: Provides ability to open only some bookmarks in a folder as a partial tree on Tree Style Tab.

context_openBookmarksWithStructure_label.message: Open &as a Partial Tree from here

context_openBookmarksWithStructure_descr.message: (*available on any bookmark item saved with their tree structure, and allows you to open only the specified item and its descendants in a folder)

config_openDiscarded_label.message: Keep tabs pended until they become active
